description: Doflamingo attaches near-invisible strings to the spines of his targets at the base of the neck, allowing him to control their movements like marionettes. The victims are fully conscious but unable to control their own bodies.

firstUseContext.description: Doflamingo uses Parasite to control the G-5 Marines who resisted his Conqueror's Haki, forcing them to attack each other against their will.
firstUseContext.effectiveness: Highly effective - able to control multiple Marines simultaneously

strengths: Works on both allies and enemies
weaknesses: Can potentially be countered by cutting the strings
Stronger-willed individuals may be more difficult to control

description: A rare form of Haki that allows the user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. Only one in several million people possess this ability.

firstUseContext.description: Doflamingo unleashes Conqueror's Haki upon arriving at Punk Hazard, instantly knocking out the vast majority of G-5 Marines before they could even attack.
firstUseContext.effectiveness: Extremely effective - knocked out most of the Marine force instantly

strengths: Can incapacitate large numbers of weaker opponents instantly
Cannot be blocked by normal means
weaknesses: Ineffective against those with strong willpower
Cannot be controlled precisely to spare specific individuals
Does not work on those who possess Conqueror's Haki themselves

description: Smoker transforms his arms into smoke and launches them at high speed toward his opponent, delivering a powerful strike.

firstUseContext.description: Smoker launches White Blow at Doflamingo during their confrontation on Punk Hazard.
firstUseContext.effectiveness: Ineffective against Doflamingo, who easily counters

weaknesses: Can be countered by more powerful opponents
